channel.title: Boardgames on Pandaqi Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Boardgames on Pandaqi Blog

item.title: Photomone
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game Photomone. It’s a simple (party?) game I wanted to make for a while, but I could never quite figure out the details.

item.title: Keebble: Domino
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game Keebble Domino. As expected, it’s a variant (or spin-off) for Keebble.

item.title: Keebble: Knickknack
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game Keebble Knickknack. As expected, it’s a variant (or spin-off) for Keebble.

item.title: That's Amorphe: Pictures
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game That’s Amorphe: Pictures. As expected, it’s a variant (or spin-off, or expansion, or sequel) for That’s Amorphe.

item.title: That's Amorphe
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for my party game That’s Amorphe!. In this article, I’ll explain where the idea came from, how I developed it, and anything else that might be funny or educational.

item.title: Keebble
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for my word-based party game Keebble This is a short article about the creation process: what problems I faced, how I solved them, and other interesting tidbits I wanted to share.
